# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily life or work efficiency. Given its exceptional quality and features, I estimate its value to be significantly higher than $150. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $180. This is an exclusive offer tailored to someone with discerning tastes like yourself. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this fantastic opportunity. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
